description: {'Info': ['A historic fort located near Mogren Beach in Budva, offering spectacular views of the sea.', 'Built by the Austro-Hungarians in the 19th century as part of the coastal defense system.'], 'Key Features': ['Well-preserved military architecture, panoramic views, and proximity to beautiful beaches.'], 'working hours': ["Fort Mogren is open 24 hours a day, as it is an outdoor site. However, it's best to visit during daylight for a more enjoyable experience and to fully appreciate the views and surroundings."]}
short_description: A 19th-century fort with panoramic sea views and a rich military history.

name: Podmaine Monastery
description: {'Info': ['A Serbian Orthodox monastery located on a hill overlooking Budva.', 'Dating back to the 15th century, it played a key role in Montenegro’s religious and cultural history.'], 'Key Features': ['Medieval frescoes, peaceful courtyards, panoramic views of Budva, and a small chapel.'], 'Working Hours': ['The Podmaine Monastery is open to visitors daily from 7:00 AM to 7:00 PM. It is an active religious site, so visitors should be respectful during prayer times.']}
short_description: A historic monastery offering spirituality, stunning views, and cultural heritage.

name: Borjomi Plato Cafe & Bar
description: {'Information:': ['The Burgumi Plato Cafe and Burjumo is an ideal destination for the experience of traditional Georgian cuisine in a comfortable and distinctive atmosphere.'], 'Café features:': ['Panoramic view: The café provides stunning views of the city of Burgumi and the surrounding mountains, allowing visitors to enjoy the landscape while eating.', 'A comfortable interior design: The cafe features a warm interior design with a real fireplace, creating a comfortable atmosphere for visitors.', 'External terrace: The cafe contains external terraces that provide an outdoor dining experience with great looks.'], 'Main dishes:': ['Traditional Georgian soup: such as the "Khasaburi" soup and "Khasaburi Ajbashi".', 'Georgian appetizers: such as "Makhlali" and "Metsoni".', 'Main dishes: such as "Shashlik", "Khasaburi" and "Khenkali".'], 'working hours:': ['Days: From Monday to Sunday.', 'Working hours: from 10:00 am until 11:00 pm.']}
short_description: Borjomi Plato Cafe & Bar offers traditional Georgian dishes with a great view of the city.

name: Riviera Budva
description: {'Info': ['A stunning 35 km stretch of coastline with sandy beaches, historic sites, and vibrant nightlife.', 'A key tourist destination since ancient times, influenced by Roman, Venetian, and Slavic cultures.'], 'Key Features': ['Pristine beaches, luxury resorts, Old Town Budva, and lively bars and restaurants.'], 'Working Hours': ['The Budva Riviera is an open coastal area accessible 24 hours a day.', 'Explore both popular and hidden beaches; visit in the early morning to avoid crowds.']}
short_description: A breathtaking coastal region with beaches, history, and nightlife.
